resources.string: Please enable admin rights to get Cerberus advanced features like uninstall protection, remote wipe and lock with password.
This feature requires Device Administration to be enabled
Gailu administratzailea gaitzeko egin klik hemen, Cerberus-ek urrutiko blokeatze eta data-ezabatzea ahal izateko.
Gailu administratzailea ezgaitzeko egin klik hemen, Cerberus kendu ahal izateko.
"Warning: disabling Cerberus admin rights you won't be able to wipe or lock your device remotely!"
Ask for username/password to remove Cerberus from Device Administrators
Alerts Cerberus will send when an unauthorized SIM card is used:
Android Wear API unavailable. Touch to install the Android Wear app.

Cerberus is a suite of services to protect your phone, yourself and your loved ones: Antitheft - the best protection you can get to recover your misplaced, lost or stolen Android device; Persona - get help in an emergency, share real-time location with your family and friends; Kids - tool for parents to help keep your children safe
You can install our apps from
Thank you for buying Cerberus, please restart the app.
Press BACK again to exit from app
Command not executed: backup already started
This device can not run Cerberus. If you feel this is in error, click the button below.
Both the normal and disguised versions of Cerberus are installed. You might want to uninstall one of them.

"You can buy Cerberus with the method of your choice. No monthly or annual fees, just a small one-time payment to use Cerberus forever. And you won't have to pay again to install Cerberus on another device, just install it and configure it with your account."
After you complete the payment, you have to restart Cerberus.
The device needs to be calibrated. Please rotate it slowly in every direction, then press \"Finish\"
Cerberus captured a video. You can find it attached to this message.
You will receive an email with the video as soon as the thief touches the screen.
Install Cerberus from the Play Store to upgrade your plan
Log into our website to upgrade your plan
Click here to check for updates
command NOT EXECUTED. Have you enabled it in Cerberus settings?
command NOT EXECUTED. Have you enabled device administration?
command NOT EXECUTED. To get this feature your device must be rooted and you have to install Cerberus in /system/app
command NOT EXECUTED. To get this feature your device must be rooted.
command NOT EXECUTED. To get this feature your device must have at least Android 4.4 and has to be rooted.
command NOT EXECUTED. Application not available.
command NOT EXECUTED. Service not available.
Zure internet konexioa lanean dagoen egiaztatu ezazu eta berriro ahalegindu zaitez.
"You can access Cerberus by dialing this number, if it's hidden from the app drawer"
The device is associated with a different Cerberus account.
Backup is already configured on Dropbox
Backup your files to Google Drive
Dropbox is not authenticated properly. Backup aborted.
Backup is already configured on Google Drive
Insufficient storage in your Dropbox. Backup aborted.
An unauthorized SIM card has been inserted into your device.
This is an automated message, please do not reply.
You will receive alerts/photos/etc. to this email if your device is lost or stolen.
Cerberus konfiguratu zenuenean jarritako e-posta idatzi ezazu. Pasahitz berria e-posta helbide honetara bidaliko dizugu.
This email address is already in use. If you have a Cerberus account, press the button
If enabled you can start Emergency Mode from your wearable
The phone will not be usable for about 30 seconds.
Requires \"Block Power Menu\" and Device Administration to be enabled.
The phone will not be usable until you send a \"Recover from fake shutdown\" command from the web dashboard.
This feature is currently disabled, press to activate it.
Pressing the power button in the lock screen will perform a fake shutdown, so hopefully a thief will think it is switched off.
If enabled you can start an alarm on this device from your wearable
Sorry, Cerberus could not find your device location.
You will receive another SMS with the location in approximately one minute.
These numbers can localize the device with a \"Cerberus find\" sms message without a password
Erabiltzaile izen edo e-posta okerra. Saiatu berriro, mesedez.
Error trying to install Google Play Services
Click here to have better location services
"GPS is on, but location by mobile/WiFi networks is off, you might not be able to get the location of the device if it's inside a building."
Reboot your device and Cerberus will not appear in the app drawer.
"I'm at least 16 years old and I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy"
"Sorry, you can't buy Cerberus on Google Play."
Cerberus will be installed as system application and device will be rebooted
Some of Cerberus features (uninstall protection, remote wipe, lock with password) are available only if you allow it to be a device administrator. You can do that by pressing this button:
If you have root access, you can give Cerberus superuser permission. This will be used for root-only features, like screenshot capture.
There are two ways to control Cerberus remotely, if your device is lost or stolen:

string.name: intro_text_v2_10
string.b: Swipe again to see all the app settings!

resources.string: 1. If your device is connected to the internet, you can log into www.cerberusapp.com from a computer or another device and send commands from the web dashboard
2. Otherwise, you can send SMS commands from another phone. A list of all available SMS commands has been sent to your email address
You can also install the app \"Client Cerberus\", that lets you easily send both web and SMS commands.
The \"third head of Cerberus\" is Automatic Alerts!
Cerberus can automatically perform actions when some conditions are met.

For instance, it will send email/SMS alerts if the SIM card is changed (see the \"SIM checker\" section of the settings) and it will email you a photo of the thief when a wrong unlock code is entered (section \"Automatic photo capture\").
You can also set your own rules, see the \"AutoTask\" section!
Also, you can install Cerberus as a system app so it will survive a factory reset and perform additional actions. See the \"I have a rooted device\" section here: https://www.cerberusapp.com/help.php
"I use Cerberus to protect my device, it's great. Try it!"
Cerberus will automatically enable the notification listener, to dismiss Hangouts notifications when the device receives SMS commands
or touch sensor to log in
Show a notification on the wearable when it loses connection with this device
"Cerberus need to re-program this tag (all current data will be overwritten). Scan the tag again to proceed."
You have to install OI File Manager from Google Play!
Alert if the device is started without a SIM card or in Airplane Mode
also detect no SIM card and Airplane Mode
Erabiltzaile edo pasahitz okerra. Saiatu berriro mesedez.
This device is protected by Cerberus. To disable this notification long-press here and you will see an option to disable notifications from Cerberus.
This device was recently associated with a Cerberus account. If you did not do it, please send an email to support@cerberusapp.com to receive assistance.
Lau hizki, gutxienez. Pasahitz hau urrutitik zure gailuaren ezarpenetara sartu eta kontrolatzeko erabiliko da.
Pasahitz berria zure e-posta helbidera bidali dizugu.

"You need to grant Cerberus the required permissions, otherwise the app will crash or not work properly. It is very important that you grant all the permissions now, because you will not be able to do it remotely, if the device is lost or stolen."
It is also highly recommended that you grant the permissions below, for better reliability.
Please press the button again and grant all the permissions. If that does not solve the problem, go to Settings -> Apps -> All -> Cerberus -> Permissions, and grant all the permissions from there.
You need to grant this permission, for the feature to work.
Take a picture when the user stops a Cerberus alarm
Take a picture when the user dismisses a Cerberus message
Take a picture if the user enters a wrong unlock pattern/PIN/password
Please press here and enable the accessibility service for System Framework, for the feature to work.
Starting with Android 9, this feature is only available in the full version of Cerberus, that you can download from www.cerberusapp.com
If activated, the power key will not work in the lock screen, so a thief will not be able to switch off the device. Requires a background service.
Menus with the following text are dismissed from the lock screen:
If the power menu on your device has a different text, please press here and change it
The unused balance of your current plan is applied to the new plan. Billing for the new plan will start after this balance is used up.
"All location services are off, you won't be able to get the location of the device!"
If enabled you can execute an AutoTask rule starting \"Cerberus\" from your wearable (the Actions will be executed immediately, regardless of Event and Conditions)
A rule with these parameters already exists!
Rule not deleted: an error occurred
Rule not saved: an error occurred
Save location history on the device, so you can retrieve it from the web dashboard
Choose if you want a black screen or white screen to be displayed while taking a picture
Cerberus grabbed a screenshot. You can find it attached to this message.
Send me special offers and promotional emails regarding Cerberus services from time to time
Password must be at least 6 characters long!
SIM txartel hau EZ DAGO BAIMENDUTA
Google removed the possibility for normal apps to read the SIM card details in Android Q. This feature is available only if you root your phone and install Cerberus as a system app
You can enter up to 3 phone numbers that will receive alerts when your device is used with an unauthorized SIM card:
You can enter up to 3 phone numbers that will receive alerts if you start Emergency Mode on this device:
Use this option if you want to customize the first word of SMS commands. Default: \"cerberus\"
Google blocked normal apps from interfering with the status bar in Android 8, so for this feature you have to install Cerberus as a system app.
If activated, the status bar will not expand in the lock screen, so a thief will not be able to modify the quick settings. Requires a background service.
Error installing Cerberus as system app
Error: This tag type is not supported
Error: This tag is not writable
Cerberus shot a picture. You can find it attached to this message.
You will receive an email with the photo as soon as the thief touches the screen.
"Please enable \"Allow External Access\" option in Tasker's preferences (under MISC category)."
Please accept the Terms of Service to proceed
Please read the document until the bottom of the page
Touch again the Android to unlock
Cerberus should now appear in the app drawer.
Cerberus will be completely uninstalled and device will be rebooted!
Set the number of consecutive failed unlock attempts after which Cerberus will take a picture
Cerberus system app need to be updated
A new version is available. Do you want to download it?
Cerberus is updated to the latest version!
If activated, it will not be possible to enable USB debugging on the device. Requires a background service.
The username has been sent to your email address:
Erabiltzaile-izen hau dagoeneko erabiltzen da. Aukeratu beste bat eta berriro ahalegindu, mesedez.
If video capture does not work, please try the different combinations of method and quality, until it works.
Cerberus baimendu urrutitik zure gailuaren datuak ezabatzeko
